details.call_for_proposals: We welcome submissions of original research on a variety of topics on conceptual modeling, including well-established and emerging areas of research and practice.

general_chairs: Oscar Pastor, Universitat Politècnica de València
program_chairs: Shazia Sadiq, The University of Queensland, Australia
Roman Lukyanenko, University of Virginia, USA

submission_information: Manuscripts must be submitted in the LNCS style and cannot exceed 16 pages (excluding references).
Submissions must not be under evaluation for or have already been published in other journals or conferences.

promotion.organizers_committee: General and Program Chairs mentioned above.
